Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Yes. This game hits many of those tropes we know and maybe love of teen horror flicks. But the way this game works\, the way it looks\, and the way it’s written and acted\, stunning. This game came out in 2014 as an early PS4 title and yet boy is it polished and man does it still hold up in 2020.
